name: Sand making machine
overview: Sand making machine can also be called vertical shaft impact crusher, it is the indispensable machine in manufactured sand production &truing. SBM developed series of sand making crusher, like VSI sand making machine and VSI5X sand making machine.
feature: Perfect final products shape greatly improve the sand grade, increasing the additional value
Large handling capacity &Adjustable feedstock modes modes
Crushing cavity is optimized, greatly reduce the operating-costs &the abrade of wear-parts
Easy to operate &maintain with the hydraulic system
application: Sand making machine is the indispensable machine in sand making industry and it is also the most ideal truing machine for mining and construction industries.
